statements: SELECT * FROM FootballClub WHERE club_id = 1;
SELECT club_name, championships_won FROM FootballClub WHERE championships_won > 5;
SELECT club_id, club_name FROM FootballClub ORDER BY club_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FootballClub WHERE player_transfers IS NOT NULL;
SELECT club_name, player_transfers->>'most_recent_transfer' AS last_transfer FROM FootballClub WHERE player_transfers->'transfer_count' > 10;
SELECT * FROM FootballClub WHERE championships_won > 5 ORDER BY club_name DESC;
SELECT club_name, championships_won FROM FootballClub WHERE club_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY championships_won ASC;
SELECT club_id, club_name, player_transfers FROM FootballClub WHERE JSON_LENGTH(player_transfers) > 0;
SELECT club_name, JSON_EXTRACT(player_transfers, '$.most_expensive_transfer') AS most_expensive_transfer FROM FootballClub WHERE JSON_LENGTH(player_transfers) > 0;
SELECT club_name, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(managerial_changes, '$[0].manager_name')) AS current_manager FROM FootballClub WHERE JSON_LENGTH(managerial_changes) > 0;
SELECT * FROM clubs WHERE club_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT club_name, championships_won FROM clubs ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_type = 'match' AND event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT club_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM clubs JOIN events ON clubs.club_id = events.club_id GROUP BY club_name;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE player_id = '78901234-5678-90ab-cdef-0123456789ab' OR manager_id = '56789012-3456-7890-abcd-234567890abc';
SELECT club_name, championships_won FROM clubs ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_type = 'Final';
SELECT club_name, COUNT(event_id) AS total_events FROM clubs LEFT JOIN events ON clubs.club_id = events.club_id GROUP BY club_name;
SELECT club_name, player_id FROM clubs JOIN events ON clubs.club_id = events.club_id WHERE events.event_type = 'Goal';
SELECT club_name, manager_id FROM clubs JOIN events ON clubs.club_id = events.club_id WHERE events.event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY manager_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM club_championships ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT club_name, championships_won FROM club_championships WHERE championships_won > 5;
SELECT player_name, new_club FROM player_transfers;
SELECT club_name, manager_name, change_date FROM managerial_changes ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, previous_club, new_club, transfer_fee FROM player_transfers WHERE transfer_fee > 100000;
SELECT club_name, championships_won FROM club_championships WHERE championships_won > 5 ORDER BY championships_won DESC;
SELECT player_name, previous_club, new_club, transfer_fee FROM player_transfers WHERE transfer_fee > 100000 ORDER BY transfer_fee DESC;
SELECT manager_name, club_name, change_date FROM managerial_changes WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM club_championships WHERE championships_won BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT player_name, new_club FROM player_transfers WHERE new_club IN ('Real Madrid', 'Barcelona') ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM championships;
SELECT club_name, year, championship_name FROM championships ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM clubs WHERE location='London';
SELECT club_name, manager_name FROM managerial_changes WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT player_name, transfer_fee, from_club, to_club FROM player_transfers ORDER BY transfer_fee DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM championships WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT club_name, championship_name FROM championships WHERE year > 2018 ORDER BY championship_name;
SELECT club_name, MAX(transfer_fee) AS max_fee FROM player_transfers GROUP BY club_name HAVING max_fee > 5000000;
SELECT club_name, manager_name FROM managerial_changes JOIN clubs ON managerial_changes.club_name = clubs.club_name;
SELECT * FROM clubs ORDER BY stadium_capacity DESC, club_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FootballClubs;
SELECT club_name, founded_year FROM FootballClubs ORDER BY founded_year DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, player_name, transfer_fee FROM PlayerTransfers WHERE transfer_fee > 5000000;
SELECT * FROM PlayerTransfers ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT club_name, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM FootballClubs JOIN PlayerTransfers ON FootballClubs.club_id = PlayerTransfers.from_club_id GROUP BY club_name;
SELECT club_name, founded_year FROM FootballClubs WHERE country='England';
SELECT player_name, transfer_fee, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransfers WHERE transfer_fee > 500000 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT championship_name, year FROM Championships ORDER BY year ASC, championship_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT club_name FROM FootballClubs;
SELECT manager_name, change_date FROM ManagerialChanges WHERE club_id IN (1, 3, 5);
